title: btcchamp88
author: btcchamp88
content: hello i heard cryptopay start a new card program is this true? but its only available as app not as desktop website, why? anyone have information about it?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You registered bitcointalk account just yesterday and you are spamming this forum with questions. Continue to spam if you like. But know that spamming will not help you on this forum. Your transaction has not been confirmed for six days, you can not reply there after some people gave you some advice. I do not believe anything that you are posting.You have posted four topics, you did not reply to any.

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: I've seen him starting new threads pretending to be new to bitcoin. He hasn't replied to helpers in threads he's created. It's doesn't look good when users offer genuine advice to ppl who don't need it they're intentions are spamming.What's wrong with btcchamp88. comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: He might be not satisfied or maybe he doesn't want to wait for 360 seconds wait-time. Since the OP is a newbie he can't able to respond right away.Or maybe he just doesn't know how to go back or find his old thread.For the main topic about CryptoPay, they are offering cards since 2016 based on their official thread that they created here on the forum I don't know what you mean by a new card program or you might be talking about their app?Before there is a signup or join button on the site but right now they force you to open an account through the app I don't know what's the reason but it is way easier to use than before.Why not check their social media accounts about their service from the official thread below?- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1384807.0

Because i did not prefer to check the OP's profile but after reading it i suspected and then i read your and i was right about it.I have also seen many other members were trying to make posts and trying to include the KW of Bitget in there post. I also reported some not to moderators but just like this one you just mentioned/reported. should we report them to moderators too?
